notification.saved: Your consent settings have been saved!

front.title: We value your privacy
front.description: {{company}} uses cookies and technologies such as Google Analytics to count, track and analyze visits. This helps us to improve your experience on this website. Click below to consent to use these technologies. You can change your consent choices any time by clicking on 'Change Consent' in the footer.

options.title: We value your privacy
options.description: You can change the settings below to determine how you want your data to be used. Each purpose describes how we and our partners use your data.

cookieDecisions.title: cookieDecisions
cookieDecisions.description: Saves your decisions that you set here!

pwa_prompt.title: PWA_PROMPT
pwa_prompt.description: This saves whether or not you have been prompted to install this website as PWA.

api_token.title: API_TOKEN
api_token.description: This saves your current API token to authenticate with the backend.

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: We use Google Analytics to count, track and analyze visits. This helps us to understand how people use the site.
